Articles.Content:
I was thinking the other day that the sounds Gene Kerman makes while you're browsing contracts would make some awesome ringtone/text notification sounds. Does anybody know if they are in a place where I can get to them in the game directory? I looked in the sounds folders and there were a few sounds, but not those. Are they in an archive somewhere that I can crack open? Any ideas?

Scott

They could be in the sharedassets files but I don't really know, I'll have a dig around later. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

EDIT: If I can't find 'em, I could always record his voice from the game and upload it somewhere for you.

I think a better ringtone would be the random sounds of explosions you hear while thrusting in map view, and you quickly go back to spaceship view and nothing has actually gone wrong.... I'd use that for certain "Chicken Little" people to whom I regret giving my phone number ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
